mapper.insert: INSERT INTO songpring_shop (num, title, imagePath, genre, writer, publisher, regdate, price, content, sellCount, page, bookSize) VALUES(songpring_shop_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{imagePath}, #{genre}, #{writer}, #{publisher}, #{regdate}, #{price}, #{content}, 0, #{page}, #{bookSize})
mapper.select: SELECT num, title, imagePath, genre, writer, publisher, TO_CHAR(regdate , 'YYYY-MM') as regdate, price, content FROM (SELECT * FROM songpring_shop ORDER BY dbms_random.value) WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 4
mapper.insert: insert into SONGPRING_CART (cartNum, userId, gdsNum, cartStock) values (SONGPRING_CART_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNum as cartNum, c.userId as userId, c.gdsNum as gdsNum, c.cartStock as cartStock, c.addDate as addDate, s.num as num, s.title as gdsName, s.genre as genre, s.price as gdsPrice, s.imagePath as gdsThumbImg FROM songpring_cart c,songpring_shop s WHERE c.userId=#{userId} and c.gdsNum = s.num ORDER BY addDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into SONGPRING_ORDER(orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhon}, #{amount})
insert into SONGPRING_ORDER_DETAILS(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select SONGPRING_ORDER_DETAILS_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from SONGPRING_CART
